definition: a body of citizens sworn to give a true verdict according to the evidence presented in a court of law
details:
noun
- a body of citizens sworn to give a true verdict according to the evidence presented in a court of law
= example: a body of citizens sworn to give a true verdict according to the evidence presented in a court of law
- a committee appointed to judge a competition
= example: a committee appointed to judge a competition
= synonyms: panel
